data: Ariyeh H. Maller Associate Professor New York City College of Technology (718) 260-5498 amaller@citytech.cuny.edu Website Ph.D. in Physics, University of California Santa Cruz Cosmology, galaxy formation, gravitational lensing, quasar absorption systems.
